pyro.description: The power to make molecules hiper-vibrate , thus increasing temperature

Fireburst.description: A small burst of continues flames in a medium_wide area that travel up to a short distance

Conflagración.description: A straight forward wave of fire that vanishes along its path

Amni.description: The power to move molecules from one spot to another

[Pasiva] Agilidad mágica.description: A thin layer of air surrounding the user's body moves towards where the user is about to move, thus decreasing physical air resistance and increasing one's agility by (1.5) times

[Follow_up] Empuje.description: After aking {4} steps with (Agilidad mágica) ON, a sudden stop causes a follow_up shockwave that keeps moving forward over {2} units and smashes against the first obstacle in its path, dealing {14} damage and can knockback

Gi.description: The power to connect to the planet's natural energies

Invoca al espíritu del lobo (joven).description: Summons a young spirit wolf that obeys commands and aids you in battle
